Text: What role enables someone to authorize a request, with no other permissions on the platform?
What is a formatter? Select one of the following.

Answers.Text: A formatter allows you to configure applications on your instance
A formatter is a set of conditions applied to a table to help find and work with data
A formatter allows you to populate fields automatically
A formatter is a form element used to display information that is not a field in the record

Text:
On a related list, which buttons are commonly used for managing the records on the list?
Select 3 answers.
Which one of the following statements is true about Column Context Menus?

Answers.Text: It displays actions such as creating quick reports, configuring the list, and exporting data
It displays actions such as view form, view related task, and add relationship
It displays actions related to viewing and filtering the entire list
It displays actions related to filtering options, assigning tags, and search

Text: On the knowledge base record, which tab would you use to define which users are not able to write articles to the knowledge base?
How would you navigate to the Schema map for a table?

Answers.Text: System Dictionary > Show Schema Map; Select Table
System Definition > Tables; Select Table; Go to Related links and click Show Schema Map
System Definition > Dictionary; Select Table; Go to Related links and click Show Schema Map
System Definition > Show Schema Map; Select Table

wpProQuiz_correct: Generate a schema map to view and easily access different parts of the database schema.1. Navigate to All > System Definition > Tables & Columns.2. In the Table Names pane, select a table.3. Click Schema map.The schema map for the selected table opens in a separate tab or window.If required, you can print this map from the browser.

Text: When looking at a long list of records, you want to quickly filter, to show only those which have Category of Hardware. How might you do that?

Answers.Text: Click Funnel icon, type Hardware and click enter
Right click on magnifier, type Hardware and click enter
On the Category column header, right click and select Show > Hardware
On Breadcrumb, click > icon, type Hardware and click enter
On the list, locate and right click on the value Hardware, select Show Matching

wpProQuiz_correct: To quickly filter a list using a value in a field, right-click in the field and select Show Matching or Filter Out.

Text:
Which of the following are a type of client scripts supported in ServiceNow?
Select 4 answers.

Which modules can you use to create a new table?
Select 2 answers.
wpProQuiz_correct: Test this in your instance and verify!

Text: Which module would you use to create a new automation of business logic such as approvals, tasks, and notifications?
Which of the following is NOT a database setting on the Application Access section of a Table?
A task worker asks how they can monitor any updates occurring to records assigned to him, like responses from customers. What do you suggest?

Answers.Text: Click on the eyeglass icon to expand the Monitor frame
Open an Agent workspace tab for each record he wants to monitor
On My Work list, select the Activity Stream icon to show a frame with live updates
Select Service Desk > My Work Dashboard

Text: On what part of the ServiceNow instance, would you find the option to Impersonate User?
What section on a task record would you use to see the most recent update made to a record?
Which script runs when a record is displayed, inserted, updated, deleted, or when a table is queried?
What type of client script runs when a cell on a list changes value through use of the List editor?
What will happen if you click ‘Show Matching‘ on the ‘Software‘ category on the incident list?

Answers.Text: All incidents with Software category will remain visible
It will open a new window in your browser and display all the tickets other than Software
All incidents with Software category will disappear from the list

wpProQuiz_correct: To quickly filter a list using a value in a field, right-click in the field and select Show Matching or Filter Out. For date fields, choose from Show Before, Show After, and Filter Out.

Text: On the Form header, which element you to access form templates?

Which section is used to adjust the look of your report, including colors, titles and legend layout?
Which term refers to application menus and modules which you may want to access quickly and often?
What icon do you use to change the label on a Favorite?
What is the sequence of conditions in an SLA definition?
What happens if you select Publish when creating articles manually or by import?

Answers.Text: It triggers the publish workflow assigned to the knowledge base.
The articles are sent for review
The articles are automatically moved to a published state.
The articles are sent for approvals.

Text: On a form, which type of field has this icon which can be clicked, to see a preview of the associated record?
wpProQuiz_correct: In ServiceNow, a Reference field is used to link to another record in a different table (e.g., "Caller" references the User table).

Text:
What are examples of UI Actions relating to forms?
Select 3 answers.
What is the path an Administrator could take to view the fulfillment stage task list for an order placed by a user?
wpProQuiz_correct: REQ contains RITMs and RITM contains TASKs

Text: Which field type displays records from another table?
wpProQuiz_correct: Read more here about field types: https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/utah-platform-administration/page/administer/reference-pages/reference/r_FieldTypes.html

Text: Which three Variable Types can be added to a Service Catalog Item?

Answers.Text: Number List, Single Line Text, and Reference
Multiple Choice, Select Box, and Checkbox

Text: What controls the publishing and retiring process for knowledge articles?
What ServiceNow feature allows you to include data from a secondary related table on a report?
wpProQuiz_correct: You can dotwalk to related records using Choose columns in the Configure section.

Text: Which tab on the knowledge base record, would you use to identify the sets of users who are able to read articles in that knowledge base?
wpProQuiz_correct: You specify user criteria for a knowledge base to control which users are granted access to read and contribute knowledge articles to that knowledge base.

Text: What do you click when you have made modifications to your report, and you want to see the results without saving?
wpProQuiz_correct: After configuring a report, click the Run button to run the report without saving the changes. To run the report and save the changes, click the Save button.

Text: Which role can manage multiple knowledge bases?

While showing a customer their Incident form, they ask to change the Priority field title to display their internal terminology. How would you do that?
Select 2 answers.

Answers.Text: Right click on Priority and select Configure Dictionary
Right click on Priority and select Configure Label
Right click on Priority and select Configure Display Settings
Right click on Priority and select Configure Column

Text:
What options are available to choose from in the ‘When‘ field in the Business Rule?
Select 2 answers
Where can we create SLAs, OLAs and Underpinning Contracts?
wpProQuiz_correct: In ServiceNow, SLAs (Service Level Agreements), OLAs (Operation Level Agreements), and Underpinning Contracts are all managed within the Service Level Management (SLM) application. This module provides dedicated functionalities for defining, configuring, and monitoring these agreements, ensuring smooth service delivery across your organization.

Text: What is the name of text indexing search engine used in ServiceNow?
wpProQuiz_correct: In ServiceNow, the default text indexing and search engine is called Zing.

Text: In Knowledge Base, articles are grouped by?
wpProQuiz_correct: In the ServiceNow Knowledge Base, articles are primarily grouped by Categories.

Text: What do client request + server response =?
wpProQuiz_correct: The equation client request + server response = round trip accurately represents communication between a client and a server.

Text: What does specifying a coalesce mean?

Answers.Text: It's a special data set brought over using a different module
Make the report that will feed the gauge
The field or fields you specify will be used as a unique key

wpProQuiz_correct: In ServiceNow, specifying a coalesce means the field or fields you specify will be used as a unique key when importing data.

Text: A role does not inherit all the permissions of any other roles it includes.
wpProQuiz_correct: The statement is FALSE. In ServiceNow, a role can inherit permissions from other roles it includes. This is a key feature for managing user access efficiently.

Text: What is contextual security?

Answers.Text: Means the field has been modified
Its a system security type, which Controls every level in the servicenow object hierarchy. You can control specific tables and fields.
It's a group of customizations that can be packaged and moved from one instance to another

Text: Client Script on the Task table will be applied to Problem table as well
wpProQuiz_correct: The correct answer is Only if inherit is true.
